actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A resolution prohibiting discrimination in employment in the Senate.

summary.text: Prohibits discrimination in employment in the Senate by any Member, officer or employee of the Senate because of race, color, religion, sex or national origin. Provides that the Select Committee on Standards and Conduct shall have jurisdiction to enforce this resolution.

titles.title: A resolution prohibiting discrimination in employment in the Senate.
